metadata.name: British Registration Plates

description.footerLinkTitle: [CLICK HERE] For my British UK Road Signs mod

metadata.description:
Adds various British styled registration plates, this mod includes yellow GB identifier plate, pre-1973 black plate, yellow non-identifier plate, white GB identifier plate, white UK identifier plate, official UK registration plate characters and normal maps for all plates and font.
**Please remember to create a backup of the original files in case something goes wrong so you can just copy them back over** **I highly recommend using a mods folder to avoid corrupting your game installation if something goes wrong.**
--Problems/Bugs-- - Game still uses default license plate colours, will change these when I figure out where the game stores this data.
--Credits-- You may use these signs in YouTube videos or in showcases but please give credit if you do so, thank you.
